document.full_text: kenyan authorities began an investigation tuesday into samuel wanjiru's death in a balcony fall, while the olympic marathon champion's mother accused his wife of killing him to gain control of his property.
document.title: kenya begins investigation into wanjiru's death
lines_and_colors: kenyan authorities began an investigation tuesday into samuel wanjiru's death in a balcony fall, while the olympic marathon champion's mother accused his wife of killing him to gain control of his property.
